players.name: Alice
memory:
Charlie: "
I am innocent and I didn't kill Diana.
"
Charlie: "Be careful, the mafioso is among us and they killed Diana. I suggest we all work together to find them."
You: "I think Charlie is the mafioso because he was acting suspiciously by saying 'be careful' and then immediately claiming to be innocent. I don't trust him."
Bob: "I think Alice is mistaken, Charlie's message was a clever attempt to deflect suspicion. I suggest we investigate Alice instead."

players.name: Bob
